item.title: Hugo
item.description: hugo build checking hugo server --baseURL "http://{ip addr}:1313" --bind "0.0.0.0" hugo server --baseURL "http://192.168.35.39:1313" --bind "0.0.0.0" add .md file hugo new *.md build hugo -t [theme DIR] hugo -t hyde git push cd public git add . git commit -m "<커밋 메세지>" git push origin master cd .. git add . git commit -m "<커밋 메세지>" git push origin master
